messages.text: Hi Alex! Welcome to VoiceUp Support. How can I help you?
My internet keeps disconnecting and it's really frustrating!
I'm so sorry for the inconvenience, Alex. Let me check this for you.
Thanks, I hope it gets fixed soon.
I have reset your connection. Could you please check now?
Yes, it's working now. Thank you!
Hello, how can I assist you today?
My router is showing a red light and no internet.
No worries, our routers usually fix themselves in a few minutes.
Are you sure? This has been happening for an hour.
Guaranteed it will be fine soon!
